hmDhcps.name: hmDhcps

revisions.description: Added ICMP echo probe and pool vendor option.

hmDhcps.contactinfo: Customer Support Postal: Hirschmann Automation and Control GmbH Stuttgarter Str. 45-51 72654 Neckartenzlingen Germany Tel: +49 7127 14 1981 Web: http://www.hicomcenter.com/ E-Mail: hicomcenter@hirschmann.com
hmDhcps.description: The Hirschmann Private DHCP MIB definitions for Platform devices.

hmDHCPServerMode.name: hmDHCPServerMode
hmDHCPServerMode.description: Enable or disable DHCP server global.

hmDHCPServerAddrProbe.name: hmDHCPServerAddrProbe
hmDHCPServerAddrProbe.description: If set to enable the DHCP server probes the allocated address with an ICMP Echo Request before offering to the client.

hmDHCPServerPoolTable.name: hmDHCPServerPoolTable
hmDHCPServerPoolTable.description: A table containing the DHCP server pools.

hmDHCPServerPoolEntry.name: hmDHCPServerPoolEntry
hmDHCPServerPoolEntry.description: A logical row in the hmDHCPServerPoolTable.

hmDHCPServerPoolStartIpAddress.name: hmDHCPServerPoolStartIpAddress
hmDHCPServerPoolStartIpAddress.description: The IPv4 address of the first address in the range. The value of hmDHCPServerPoolStartIpAddress MUST be less than or equal to the value of hmDHCPServerPoolEndIpAddress.

hmDHCPServerPoolEndIpAddress.name: hmDHCPServerPoolEndIpAddress
hmDHCPServerPoolEndIpAddress.description: The IPv4 address of the last address in the range. The value of hmDHCPServerPoolEndIpAddress MUST be greater than or equal to the value of hmDHCPServerPoolStartIpAddress.

hmDHCPServerPoolLeaseTime.name: hmDHCPServerPoolLeaseTime
hmDHCPServerPoolLeaseTime.description: The pools lease time in number of seconds. A value of 4294967295 SHOULD be used for leases that have a lease time which is 'infinite' and for BOOTP leases.

hmDHCPServerPoolFlags.name: hmDHCPServerPoolFlags
hmDHCPServerPoolFlags.description: This object shows the parameters that are used to lease the IP Address.

hmDHCPServerPoolMacAddress.name: hmDHCPServerPoolMacAddress
hmDHCPServerPoolMacAddress.description: The MAC Address of the entry that is used to lease the IP Address.

hmDHCPServerPoolGateway.name: hmDHCPServerPoolGateway
hmDHCPServerPoolGateway.description: The IPv4 address of the Gatewayinterface that is used to lease the IP Address.

hmDHCPServerPoolClientId.name: hmDHCPServerPoolClientId
hmDHCPServerPoolClientId.description: The Client Identifier of the entry that is used to lease the IP Address.

hmDHCPServerPoolRemoteId.name: hmDHCPServerPoolRemoteId
hmDHCPServerPoolRemoteId.description: The Remote Identifier of the entry that is used to lease the IP Address. The Remote Identifier must be send in Option 82 as defined in RFC 3046.

hmDHCPServerPoolCircuitId.name: hmDHCPServerPoolCircuitId
hmDHCPServerPoolCircuitId.description: The Cicuit Identifier of the entry that is used to lease the IP Address. The Circuit Identifier must be send in Option 82 as defined in RFC 3046.

hmDHCPServerPoolVlanId.name: hmDHCPServerPoolVlanId
hmDHCPServerPoolVlanId.description: The Vlan ID of the entry that is used to lease the IP Address. A value of -1 corresponds to management vlan (the default), any other value (1-4042) represents a specific VLAN

hmDHCPServerPoolOptionConfFileName.name: hmDHCPServerPoolOptionConfFileName
hmDHCPServerPoolOptionConfFileName.description: Full specified name of the configuration file e.g. tftp://192.9.200.1/cfg/config1.sav. An empty string zeros the SNAME and the FILE field in the DHCP header.

hmDHCPServerPoolOptionGateway.name: hmDHCPServerPoolOptionGateway
hmDHCPServerPoolOptionGateway.description: The IPv4 address of the Gateway. A value of 0 disables the attachment of the option field in the DHCP message.

hmDHCPServerPoolOptionNetmask.name: hmDHCPServerPoolOptionNetmask
hmDHCPServerPoolOptionNetmask.description: The subnet mask. A value of 0 disables the attachment of the option field in the DHCP message.

hmDHCPServerPoolOptionWINS.name: hmDHCPServerPoolOptionWINS
hmDHCPServerPoolOptionWINS.description: The IPv4 address of the WINS Server. A value of 0 disables the attachment of the option field in the DHCP message.

hmDHCPServerPoolOptionDNS.name: hmDHCPServerPoolOptionDNS
hmDHCPServerPoolOptionDNS.description: The IPv4 address of the DNS Server. A value of 0 disables the attachment of the option field in the DHCP message.

hmDHCPServerPoolOptionHostname.name: hmDHCPServerPoolOptionHostname
hmDHCPServerPoolOptionHostname.description: The name of the client (Option 12). An empty string disables the attachment of the option field in the DHCP message.

hmDHCPServerPoolOptionVendor.name: hmDHCPServerPoolOptionVendor
hmDHCPServerPoolOptionVendor.description: Vendor Specific Information (Option 43) as hex string.

hmDHCPServerPoolErrorStatus.name: hmDHCPServerPoolErrorStatus
hmDHCPServerPoolErrorStatus.description: The error Code by create a new Pool.

hmDHCPServerPoolRowStatus.name: hmDHCPServerPoolRowStatus
hmDHCPServerPoolRowStatus.description: This object indicates the status of this entry.

hmDHCPServerLeaseTable.name: hmDHCPServerLeaseTable
hmDHCPServerLeaseTable.description: A table containing the DHCP server leases.

hmDHCPServerLeaseEntry.name: hmDHCPServerLeaseEntry
hmDHCPServerLeaseEntry.description: A logical row in the hmDHCPServerLeaseTable.

hmDHCPServerLeasePoolIndex.name: hmDHCPServerLeasePoolIndex
hmDHCPServerLeasePoolIndex.description: The index of the hmDHCPServerPoolTable above.

hmDHCPServerLeaseIpAddress.name: hmDHCPServerLeaseIpAddress
hmDHCPServerLeaseIpAddress.description: This is an IP address from the pool with index hmDHCPServerLeasePoolIndex.

hmDHCPServerLeaseTimeRemaining.name: hmDHCPServerLeaseTimeRemaining
hmDHCPServerLeaseTimeRemaining.description: The remaining time of the lease configured in hmDHCPServerPoolLeaseTime.

hmDHCPServerLeaseIfIndex.name: hmDHCPServerLeaseIfIndex
hmDHCPServerLeaseIfIndex.description: The interface index where the lease is currently active.

hmDHCPServerLeaseClientMacAddress.name: hmDHCPServerLeaseClientMacAddress
hmDHCPServerLeaseClientMacAddress.description: The MAC Address of the entry that has leased the IP Address.

hmDHCPServerLeaseGateway.name: hmDHCPServerLeaseGateway
hmDHCPServerLeaseGateway.description: The IPv4 address of the Gatewayinterface that was used to lease the IP Address.

hmDHCPServerLeaseClientId.name: hmDHCPServerLeaseClientId
hmDHCPServerLeaseClientId.description: The Client Identifier of the entry that was used to lease the IP Address.

hmDHCPServerLeaseRemoteId.name: hmDHCPServerLeaseRemoteId
hmDHCPServerLeaseRemoteId.description: The Remote Identifier of the entry that was used to lease the IP Address.

hmDHCPServerLeaseCircuitId.name: hmDHCPServerLeaseCircuitId
hmDHCPServerLeaseCircuitId.description: The Cicuit Identifier of the entry that was used to lease the IP Address.

hmDHCPServerLeaseAction.name: hmDHCPServerLeaseAction
hmDHCPServerLeaseAction.description: Manually release this ip address for new assignment.

hmDHCPServerLeaseVlanId.name: hmDHCPServerLeaseVlanId
hmDHCPServerLeaseVlanId.description: The Vlan ID of the entry that is used to lease the IP Address. A value of -1 corresponds to management vlan (the default), any other value (1-4042) represents a specific VLAN

hmDHCPServerIfConfigTable.name: hmDHCPServerIfConfigTable
hmDHCPServerIfConfigTable.description: A table containing current configuration information for each interface.

hmDHCPServerIfConfigEntry.name: hmDHCPServerIfConfigEntry
hmDHCPServerIfConfigEntry.description: A logical row in the hmDHCPServerIfConfigTable.

hmDHCPServerIfConfigMode.name: hmDHCPServerIfConfigMode
hmDHCPServerIfConfigMode.description: Enable or disable DHCP server on this interface.

hmDHCPServerCounterIfTable.name: hmDHCPServerCounterIfTable
hmDHCPServerCounterIfTable.description: A table containing current configuration information for each interface.

hmDHCPServerCounterIfEntry.name: hmDHCPServerCounterIfEntry
hmDHCPServerCounterIfEntry.description: A logical row in the hmDHCPServerCounterIfTable.

hmDHCPServerCounterBootpRequests.name: hmDHCPServerCounterBootpRequests
hmDHCPServerCounterBootpRequests.description: The number of packets received that contain a Message Type of 1 (BOOTREQUEST) in the first octet and do not contain option number 53 (DHCP Message Type) in the options.

hmDHCPServerCounterBootpInvalids.name: hmDHCPServerCounterBootpInvalids
hmDHCPServerCounterBootpInvalids.description: The number of packets received that do not contain a Message Type of 1 (BOOTREQUEST) in the first octet or are not valid BOOTP packets (e.g., too short, invalid field in packet header).

hmDHCPServerCounterBootpReplies.name: hmDHCPServerCounterBootpReplies
hmDHCPServerCounterBootpReplies.description: The number of packets sent that contain a Message Type of 2 (BOOTREPLY) in the first octet and do not contain option number 53 (DHCP Message Type) in the options.

hmDHCPServerCounterBootpDroppedUnknownCl.name: hmDHCPServerCounterBootpDroppedUnknownClients
hmDHCPServerCounterBootpDroppedUnknownCl.description: The number of BOOTP packets dropped due to the server not recognizing or not providing service to the hardware address received in the incoming packet.

hmDHCPServerCounterBootpDroppedNotServin.name: hmDHCPServerCounterBootpDroppedNotServingSubnet
hmDHCPServerCounterBootpDroppedNotServin.description: The number of BOOTP packets dropped due to the server not being configured or not otherwise able to serve addresses on the subnet from which this message was received.

hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Discovers.name: hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Discovers
hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Discovers.description: The number of DHCPDISCOVER (option 53 with value 1) packets received.

hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Offers.name: hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Offers
hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Offers.description: The number of DHCPOFFER (option 53 with value 2) packets sent.

hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Requests.name: hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Requests
hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Requests.description: The number of DHCPREQUEST (option 53 with value 3) packets received.

hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Declines.name: hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Declines
hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Declines.description: The number of DHCPDECLINE (option 53 with value 4) packets received.

hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Acks.name: hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Acks
hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Acks.description: The number of DHCPACK (option 53 with value 5) packets sent.

hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Naks.name: hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Naks
hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Naks.description: The number of DHCPNACK (option 53 with value 6) packets sent.

hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Releases.name: hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Releases
hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Releases.description: The number of DHCPRELEASE (option 53 with value 7) packets received.

hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Informs.name: hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Informs
hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Informs.description: The number of DHCPINFORM (option 53 with value 8) packets received.

hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4ForcedRenews.name: hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4ForcedRenews
hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4ForcedRenews.description: The number of DHCPFORCERENEW (option 53 with value 9) packets sent.

hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Invalids.name: hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Invalids
hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4Invalids.description: The number of DHCP packets received whose DHCP message type (i.e., option number 53) is not understood or handled by the server.

hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4DroppedUnknownC.name: hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4DroppedUnknownClient
hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4DroppedUnknownC.description: The number of DHCP packets dropped due to the server not recognizing or not providing service to the client-id and/or hardware address received in the incoming packet.

hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4DroppedNotServi.name: hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4DroppedNotServingSubnet
hmDHCPServerCounterDhcpv4DroppedNotServi.description: The number of DHCP packets dropped due to the server not being configured or not otherwise able to serve addresses on the subnet from which this message was received.

hmDHCPServerCounterMiscOtherDhcpServer.name: hmDHCPServerCounterMiscOtherDhcpServer
hmDHCPServerCounterMiscOtherDhcpServer.description: The number of BOOTP and DHCP packets from another DHCP server seen on this interface.
